Name: HOUSE OF GOD
About the game: House of God is a chaotic Rogue-Lite shooter, taking place on a randomly generated train with a heavy focus on item synergies. Following Jack as they pull the trigger, hold it down, and run headlong towards the conductor to save their dead loved one. Key features: - Randomly generated train - 50+ unique items (majority capable of synergizing) - 4 Bosses - 4 unique areas with unique enemy additions - 80 handcrafted rooms
